         <!-- -->
         <strong>
          "click to chat"
         </strong>
         and as you don’t have to save anyone’s phone number to message them, it simplifies interaction.
        </p>

         <strong>
          wa.link
         </strong>
         domain. This will increase your chat conversions, and it’s free!
        </p>
